input.label: Attribute
input.populatingSearch: | datamodelsimple type=attributes datamodel=$dm$ nodename=$object$ | search attribute!="_*" | sort + attribute

chart.title: Prediction Over Time
chart.searchTemplate: | tstats prestats=true $aggregate$ from datamodel=$dm$ where nodename="$object$" by _time span=$span$ | timechart span=$span$ $aggregate$ | predict lower$lower$=lower upper$upper$=upper $predict_options$ $aggregate$ as predict

table.title: Outliers
table.searchTemplate: | tstats prestats=true $aggregate$ from datamodel=$dm$ where nodename="$object$" by _time span=$span$ | timechart span=$span$ $aggregate$ | predict lower$lower$=lower upper$upper$=upper $predict_options$ $aggregate$ as predict | eval "$aggregate$"=case('$aggregate$'<'lower',"##icon-arrow-down##".'$aggregate$','$aggregate$'>'upper',"##icon-arrow-up##".'$aggregate$',1=1,'$aggregate$') | where '$aggregate$' LIKE "##icon%" | eval "lower$lower$(predict)"=round('lower',2) | eval predict=round(predict,2) | eval "upper$upper$(predict)"=round('upper',2) | table _time,$aggregate$,lower$lower$(predict),predict,upper$upper$(predict)
